statements: SELECT * FROM patient_records WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT full_name, dob FROM patient_records WHERE condition = 'Healthy';
SELECT * FROM patient_records WHERE dob >= '1990-01-01';
SELECT full_name, address, phone_number FROM patient_records WHERE condition = 'Critical' ORDER BY full_name ASC;
SELECT full_name, dob, gender FROM patient_records WHERE gender = 'Female' ORDER BY dob DESC;
SELECT * FROM patient_records;
SELECT full_name, dob, gender FROM patient_records WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT patient_id, full_name, dob, address FROM patient_records WHERE dob BETWEEN '1990-01-01' AND '1999-12-31';
SELECT full_name, address, phone_number FROM patient_records WHERE address LIKE '%Lane%';
SELECT patient_id, full_name, condition FROM patient_records WHERE condition IS NOT NULL ORDER BY full_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, date_of_birth FROM Patients ORDER BY patient_name DESC;
SELECT diagnosis FROM Patients WHERE gender='Male';
SELECT * FROM Visits ORDER BY visit_date ASC;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, doctor_name FROM Patients JOIN Visits ON Patients.patient_id = Visits.patient_id;
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'Male' ORDER BY patient_name ASC;
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth, gender FROM Patients WHERE date_of_birth BETWEEN '1990-01-01' AND '2000-01-01';
SELECT patient_name, doctor_name FROM Patients p JOIN Visits v ON p.patient_id = v.patient_id WHERE v.diagnosis LIKE '%flu%' ORDER BY v.visit_date DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT diagnosis FROM Patients WHERE diagnosis IS NOT NULL;
SELECT AVG(patient_id) AS average_patient_id FROM Patients;
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, gender, phone_number FROM Patients;
SELECT diagnosis, treatment FROM Medical_Records ORDER BY date_entered DESC;
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth, gender, phone_number FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'F';
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth, appointment_date, doctor_name, location FROM Patients JOIN Appointment_Records ON Patients.patient_id = Appointment_Records.patient_id;
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth, gender FROM Patients;
SELECT * FROM Patients ORDER BY patient_name DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS num_records FROM Medical_Records WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT patient_name, COUNT(*) AS num_appointments FROM Patients JOIN Appointment_Records ON Patients.patient_id = Appointment_Records.patient_id GROUP BY Patients.patient_id;
SELECT patient_name, doctor_name FROM Patients JOIN Appointment_Records ON Patients.patient_id = Appointment_Records.patient_id WHERE date_of_birth < '1990-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, age FROM Patients ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT medication_name, dosage FROM Medications WHERE start_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT doctor_name, specialization FROM Doctors WHERE specialization = 'Cardiology';
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis, date_recorded FROM Patients JOIN MedicalHistory ON Patients.patient_id = MedicalHistory.patient_id;
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM Patients ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT patient_name, gender, date_admitted FROM Patients WHERE age > 60;

SELECT Patients.patient_name, MedicalHistory.diagnosis, Medications.medication_name FROM Patients INNER JOIN MedicalHistory ON Patients.patient_id = MedicalHistory.patient_id INNER JOIN Medications ON Patients.patient_id = Medications.patient_id;
SELECT Doctors.doctor_name, Doctors.specialization, Patients.patient_name, Patients.age FROM Doctors INNER JOIN Patients ON Doctors.doctor_id = Patients.patient_id;
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth FROM Patients ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC;
SELECT patient_name, address, phone_number FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT doctor_name, hospital FROM Doctors WHERE specialization = 'Cardiology';
SELECT appointment_date, appointment_time FROM Appointments WHERE status = 'Scheduled';
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, date_of_birth FROM Patients ORDER BY patient_name DESC;
SELECT doctor_name, specialization FROM Doctors WHERE hospital = 'XYZ General Hospital';
SELECT appointment_id, appointment_date, status FROM Appointments WHERE status IN ('Confirmed', 'Pending') ORDER BY appointment_date ASC;
SELECT medication_name, dosage, frequency FROM Medications WHERE patient_id = 12345;
